txt.en: Make your way into the larder and collect a crate of mushrooms, then deliver the mushrooms to one of the sluggard miners milling about in the cavern below.
You failed to deliver the snack
You delivered the snack and the lazy prospector dropped some ore
A sneaky hobbit stole the snack
Deliver a snack to a lazy prospector
Sluggard miners are more trouble than aid during the event. Fortunately, a quick bite of a mushroom from here in the deep will give them a little zeal.
Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended

'There are Men here to help from the surface. I have found them incapable of focus or vim.

'I know we can inspire them with a little bit of mushroom from here in the cavern.

'Head to the larder and collect a crate of mushrooms. Deliver it to one of the sluggard miners and watch how fast he works.'
Deliver a snack to a lazy prospector

'I will not impugn your entire race, but I will impugn the sluggards milling aimlessly about our cavern.

'The fools were meant to assist us, but all they do is stumble about and cause difficulty. I believe, however, with a bit of careful intervention from another Man, like yourself, they may respond better.

'Go to the larder and collect a crate of mushrooms to deliver to them. Watch how quickly they work after.'
Hard Tack Event: Pick Them Up
